channel.title: Programming, type theory, beer brewing, you name it!
channel.description: Programming, type theory, beer brewing, you name it!

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
This website will host certain curiousities, such as information on using the ATS programming language.

Projects

  • HTML2PATS: a tool for generating HTML printers for ATS

  • PATS-EF: ATS/Postiats error filter (helps understanding the output of ATS compiler). Uses React and Jison under the hood.

  • Cycle.js MVP: an experiment in combining reactive-programming with MVP (Model-View-Presenter) using Cycle.js
item.dc:creator: Artyom Shalkhakov
